rule-essence-life.title: Use Essences for High Life
rule-essence-life.description: Essences of Greed guarantee a high tier life prefix on armour bases.
conditions: Base item has the armour tag
outcomes: Apply a Screaming or higher Essence of Greed before other crafting steps.

rule-aetheric-fossil.title: Aetheric Fossils for Spell Damage
rule-aetheric-fossil.description: Fossils can block undesirable mods and boost caster outcomes.
outcomes: Socket Aetheric + Metallic fossils to focus caster prefixes.

rule-attack-speed-bench.title: Bench Craft Attack Speed
rule-attack-speed-bench.description: The crafting bench can add mid-tier attack speed as a finishing touch.
outcomes: Use crafting bench (5 divine favour) for +14% attack speed suffix.
